ingredients.ingredient: 1 (1.4 ounce) package sugar-free instant pudding mix
1 (8 ounce) container lite frozen whipped topping, thawed

cookingTips: Let cream cheese soften to room temperature for smooth, lump-free frosting
The pudding mix flavor determines the frosting flavor - choose to complement your cake
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What cake flavor are you frosting, and which pudding flavor will complement it best?
